items.example: git init | git init --bare (dépôt nu)
git clone https://github.com/user/repo.git
git status | git status --short | git status --porcelain
git add fichier.txt | git add . | git add -A
git commit -m "message" | git commit -am "message" (add+commit)

items.description: Pousser les changements vers le distant
items.example: git push origin main | git push -u origin feature-branch
git pull origin main | git pull --rebase
git fetch origin | git fetch --all
git branch | git branch nouvelle-branche | git branch -d branche

items.description: Changer de branche ou restaurer des fichiers
items.example: git checkout main | git checkout -b nouvelle-branche
git switch main | git switch -c nouvelle-branche
git merge feature-branch | git merge --no-ff feature-branch
git rebase main | git rebase -i HEAD~3
git log --oneline | git log --graph --all
git diff | git diff --staged | git diff HEAD~1
git stash | git stash pop | git stash list
git remote -v | git remote add origin URL
git reset HEAD~1 | git reset --hard HEAD~1
git tag v1.0.0 | git tag -a v1.0.0 -m "message"
git show HEAD | git show v1.0.0
